entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who has destroyed another Horcrux. He also explains that Harry has already destroyed one of them.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who has already destroyed one of the Horcruxes and is desperate to find the remaining ones.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort's soul is mentioned as being divided into seven parts, with the seventh part residing in his body.

entities.name: marvolo
entities.description: Marvolo is mentioned as the owner of a Horcrux ring that Dumbledore destroyed.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape's timely action is mentioned when Dumbledore returned to Hogwarts.

entities.name: horcruxes
entities.description: Horcruxes are mentioned as the objects that contain pieces of Voldemort's soul and need to be destroyed.

entities.name: ring
entities.description: The ring is mentioned as a Horcrux that Dumbledore destroyed.

relationships.description: Dumbledore has destroyed one of the Horcruxes.
Harry is desperate to find the remaining Horcruxes.
Dumbledore destroyed Marvolo's ring, which was a Horcrux.
Snape helped Dumbledore when he returned to Hogwarts.
